ygData.subject: RE: Starting a new char
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not Memory Blur, Mesmerise. Mem blur takes alot of mana, 40 points, Mesmerise only 20. Besides, both spells won t work with DoT. Everytime the DoT spell
ygData.messageBody:
> WAH, so shiok ah, better than cleric liao. ;) Hmm, in that case enchanter
> shld be abt to lvl quite fast right? U cast DoT on mob and blur them...can

Not Memory Blur, Mesmerise. Mem blur takes alot of mana, 40
points, Mesmerise only 20.

Besides, both spells won't work with DoT. Everytime the DoT spell
does damage, the mob will wake up from Mesmerise, or his
memory will be refreshed with your face big big in his mind. *heh*

So this tactic not so good for enchanters alone . To use
Mesmerise, must have a very good nuker to take advantage of the
pause caused by Mesmerise. Any damage will wake up a
mesmerised creature, whether 1 point or 1000, so better make it a
BIG blow.


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
